Anime Fight in the Arena of Death

name: Anime Fight in the Arena of Death
summary:
Anime Fight in the Arena of Death is a duel with yourself. Where it is necessary in unequal combat, to fight with crowds of opponents.
A fun and addictive game in the style of beat'em'up with amazing physics. Perform dizzying tricks to defeat all opponents.
Gaining points, you rise higher and higher, confronting simultaneously more and more enemies.
